summary: Tired of blurry whiterun textures? Try this texture pack out which contains redrawn textures up to 4 times the initial resolution while keeping the original game\'s art direction intact.
descriptionHtml:
This is a high-quality texturing mod (currently for Whiterun). As you can see in the comparison pictures, i try to keep the same feel to the textures while having actual quality instead of bluriness. Some are actually redrawn at 4 times the resolution of the original file. 

Textures are 2048x2048 and 1024x2048. 

Here you can see a before/after comparison of different sections of the Whiterun Town (watch in 1080p):
[youtube]xaVgdwrmJvQ[/youtube]

Here\'s some articles about the mod:

[url=http://www.curse.com/news/skyrim/43020-skyrim-first-week-modding-highlights]Curse first week modding highlights[/url]
[url=http://www.curse.com/news/skyrim/43075-spotlight-on-some-of-skyrims-best-mods]Curse spotlight on some of skyrims best mods[/url]
[url=http://www.curse.com/news/skyrim/43289-new-curse-com-mod-video-highlights]Curse mod video highlights[/url]
[url=http://www.gamespot.com/features/gamespot-guide-to-modding-skyrim-6346415/?tag=updates%3Beditor%3Ball%3Btitle%3B3]Gamespot\'s guide to modding skyrim[/url]

Video feature (earlier version though) by MMOxReview:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=3mzHPQkBOPk

=============
Installation:
=============

1) Extract files
2) Copy Textures folder to Skyrim/Data folder
3) Play
4) Most likely you\'ll need the \"allow 4gb ram usage\" patch to allow skyrim to use more RAM otherwise you\'ll encounter purple textures/crashes -> you can find it here : http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1013

===============
Uninstallation:
===============

1) Go to your Skyrim/Data folder
2) Delete the Textures folder (not the big file, just making sure !)

====================================
Credits and distribution permission
====================================

Considering some people seem to be confused about clicking the permissions button to check what they\'re allowed to do with these files and also the fact that it might get uploaded to other sites, i\'ll specify it here just to be clear.

By downloading this file you agree to the following:

   - You can upload this file to other sites but you must credit me as the creator of the file
   - You are not allowed to convert this file to work on other games under any circumstances
   - You must get permission from me before you are allowed to modify my files to improve it
   - You must get permission from me before you are allowed to use any of the assets in this file

================
Special thanks to
================

    Bethesda for making Skyrim.
    Curse and Gamespot for featuring my mod
    Curse and Skyrimnexus for existing
    All of you for downloading and enjoying it 

===========
Changelog
===========

Version 1.01

    Added mip-maps to all textures which should improve performance

Version 1.0

    Added more textures

Version 0.8

    Added some temple textures
    Added ceiling textures
    Slightly changed the hue of a wooden floorboard

Version 0.7

    Changed alot of furniture
    Contains 0.62b fixes 

Version 0.62b

    Small offset fix for the carvings on the castle poles
    Brightness fix for the castle carpet 

Version 0.62

    Sacred tree texture redone
    All windows textures redone
    Wooden pillars inside the castle redone 

Version 0.61

    Added antlers / noble wooden table textures

Version 0.6

    Some house wood textures remade
    Some interior castle wood remade + the castle walls inside
    Some of the \"boat-like\" structure wood remade 
    Better city wall / city wall plaster blending

Version 0.52

    Fixed an issue with the city wall texture normal map when a top light (sun) was present

Version 0.51

    Updated 9 normal/specular maps to create more varied/rough bumpiness
    Updated 2 older textures 

Version 0.5

    More reworked textures
    Better blending between the ground texture/the stone walls
    New ground texture with more detail and better coloring / moss coloring
    Better bumpiness on some of the older wood textures 

Version 0.41

    Changed most of the textures to contain more micro and macro detail 

Version 0.4

    Added 11 carpet textures
    Changed a couple of old textures
    Added a few textures 

Version 0.31

    Added few textures 

Version 0.3

    Added few more textures
    Changed the normal / alpha maps to increase specularity / bumpiness on some textures
    All textures are now max 2048x2048 

Version 0.2

    Fixed transparent wall texture
    Fixed a couple of patches of dirt to blend better
    Changed the coloring a bit on a few textures to match the original better
    Added a few more textures 

DISCLAIMER: Use it on your own risk! I cannot be held accountable for any loss or damage you manage to cause by using this mod. 

That being said, it\'s a simple texture mod though, so there shouldn\'t be any issues.

*I\'ve also uploaded this mod on Skyrimforge and Curse and yes my user name there is deckardcain85*

========
Credits
========
 Bethesda for making Skyrim.

=======
Author
=======

Chris2012 on Skyrimnexus, deckardcain85 on skyrimforge/curse.
